message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. Considering its value, I propose a price of $120. This is a great opportunity to secure an excellent item at a reasonable cost.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your product and would like to purchase it. My counteroffer is $100.
Thank you for your interest, Bob. I understand your position and respect your valuation of the product. I would like to counter your offer with a price of $110.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. I am still interested in purchasing the product. My counteroffer is $105.
Thank you for your continued interest, Bob. I am willing to consider your offer further. My counteroffer is now at $107.
I appreciate your efforts in negotiating, Alice. I am still interested in purchasing the product. My counteroffer is $106.
I appreciate your persistence, Bob. After careful consideration, I am pleased to offer the product at $108.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I am still interested in purchasing the product. My counteroffer is $107.
Considering your latest offer, I am willing to sell the product at $108.50.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I am still interested in purchasing the product. My final counteroffer is $108.
